column4: hey guys i installed wine, i have an extra ntfs partition..i want to use that as a drive in wine how to do this
i tried browsing to to the ntfs partition, but its not showing in wine config
actually, do you want to use it as your WINE folder (like .wine) or as an actual drive IN WINE?
want to use it as a drive in WINE
Then after going into the drives tab, click the add button
now select which drive letter you want
Then, after clicking OK, type /media/DIRVENAME into the editable bar below the list of drives
replacing DRIVENAME with the name of the ntfs partition/drive
NO experience in it, but is there any data you want off  windows first?
